data.name: Freedom Business Account
data.description: The BankSA Freedom Business Account is a transaction account for business customers to deposit or withdraw funds by various channels. The account has a monthly plan fee and is designed for those who mainly bank electronically.

features.additionalInfo: Branch transactions : 30 free in-branch transactions (includes over the counter, electronic agency, and cheque deposits and withdrawals).
Unlimited electronic transactions : Limitless fee-free payments and receipts online and on your mobile

features.additionalValue: Business Visa Debit card : The handy way to manage your business purchases and cash withdrawals.

features.additionalInfo: Access anytime, anywhere : Manage and access your accounts online, on your mobile or tablet, in branch, and via ATMs
With PayTo, you can see, review and authorise all new PayTo payments for things such as recurring bills, memberships and subscriptions before the money leaves your account.

features.additionalValue: Real-time security alerts : Keep track of your account activity and help identify suspicious activity, with SMS and email alerts.

features.additionalInfo: Make non-cash payments via services such as BPAY, Pay Anyone, OSKO, Overseas Telegraphic Transfer (OTT), Direct Debit and optional cheque book.
Online - Limitless fee-free payments and receipts and on your mobile.
Cheque book, Periodical payments and direct debits, Agency banking  features are available
Keep control of your cash flow : Easily manage your income, outgoings, purchases and regular payments, using online and mobile banking.
Make tax time easier : Get better visibility of your finances by separating your business banking from your personal banking.
The product includes limited range of FRAUD_PROTECTION features.
Get paid (and pay) faster : Our business bank accounts default to some of the fastest methods available for making and receiving payments.
Feel secure with our guarantee : If an unauthorised transaction occurs on your account and any losses are not your fault, we'll refund the full amount.
Bonus MYOB for 12 months: Buy 1 month of MYOB Business get 12 bonus months when you subscribe with your BankSA business transaction account, debit or credit card. Offer ends 2 Oct 2024.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Operating in Australia with an Australian address.
Must not be an individual using the account for predominantly personal purposes
Eligible entities include sole traders, partnerships, companies, associations, self-managed super funds, trusts and not-for-profit organisations

fees.name: Account Keeping Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Unless your minimum monthly balance is $100,000 or more

eligibility.additionalInfo: Open a new Freedom Business Account plan to have monthly account-keeping fees waived for the first 12 months. At the end of the 12-month period, the standard monthly account-keeping fee (currently $10) will apply. T&Cs apply.

fees.name: Internet Banking
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer between your BankSA accounts, a transfer from your account to another account held within Australia, BPay and PayTo payments.

fees.name: Phone Banking
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer between your BankSA accounts, a transfer from your account to another account held within Australia and BPay payments. Excludes staff assisted transactions.

fees.name: EFTPOS
fees.additionalInfo: An eftpos transaction other than transactions undertaken on an EFT Terminal.

fees.name: Express Deposit
fees.additionalInfo:
This fee is payable for cash and non-cash deposits made to your account by use of: A tamper evident bag BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne provides and which is deposited in 
an express deposit box located in selected BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne branches; or an express deposit envelope which is deposited in an express deposit box located in selected 
BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne branches.

fees.name: Direct Credit
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is fee is charged for a deposit to your account by direct credit.

fees.name: Cheque
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for each withdrawal relating to a cheque drawn on your account.

fees.name: Staff assisted transactions
fees.additionalInfo: Where the Staff assisted transaction fee is payable, it is charged for: A withdrawal, transfer or deposit conducted through BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne staff; or cashing a cheque at a BankSA, St.George or Bank of Melbourne branch.

fees.name: Collection Item
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for a cheque or merchant envelope deposit.

fees.name: Direct Debit
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer of funds from your account drawn under a direct debit request you gave another person

fees.name: Periodical Payment
fees.additionalInfo: A transfer of funds that we make on a regular basis at your request from your account to another specific account.

fees.name: Foreign Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for any transaction that involves the conversion of an amount of foreign currency into Australian Dollars

fees.name: Frequent Statement Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged for each additional statement provided to you. The fee is charged on the last business day of the month in which the additional statement is provided.

fees.name: Overdrawn Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for each day a transaction overdraws your account or increases the amount already overdrawn, is a withdrawal against uncleared funds, or exceeds the available funds in the account at the time of the transaction.

lendingRates.additionalValue: The Unarranged Lending Rate (ULR) is a debit interest rate charged to a transaction account if it becomes overdrawn without arrangement. It will be calculated daily on the debit balance (and deducted on the last business day of each month) using the then current ULR until the account balance is positive again.
